analysis.description:
GPN (/unique_chucks/3/0xe2b407160aad5540eac0e80338b9a5085c60f25b.sol#23-251) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/3/0xe2b407160aad5540eac0e80338b9a5085c60f25b.sol#161-175)

GPN._transfer (/unique_chucks/3/0xe2b407160aad5540eac0e80338b9a5085c60f25b.sol#131-153) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(balanceOf[_from] + balanceOf[_to] == previousBalances)

GPN.centralMinter should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0xe2b407160aad5540eac0e80338b9a5085c60f25b.sol#30-31)
GPN.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0xe2b407160aad5540eac0e80338b9a5085c60f25b.sol#27-28)
